topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1: Making an Image Public

body.p: When youcreate an image or an image snapshot, as an admin, you can determine if the snapshot is available only in the current project or to all projects in the domain.

section.title: Make an image public

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Images tab.
In the Images screen, for the image you want to protect, click Edit Image, then Edit.
In the Update Image screen, select Public.

section.p: The image is public and available to all projects in the domain.
